description: A file analysis results produced by a secondary analysis pipeline.
title: Analysis file
name: analysis_file

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

matrix_cell_count.description: Number of cells analyzed in a matrix file.
matrix_cell_count.guidelines: If the analysis file is a matrix containing cells, enter the exact number of cells in the matrix.
